results.content: Overall it is a great course content and principles taught are very good. But some of later lectures need to be edited or redone. They are too long, repetitive or of poor video quality making them difficult to follow at times. Other wise it would be 5 star.

results.content: very good explain everything Thank sir

I've really enjoyed the lectures so far. I've struggled for 2 years now trying to get a handle on MVC and the file structure I see in different apps. The theory is easy to discuss but the real world is different. This instructor easily puts it all together, both theory and reality. Finally  I'm getting the answers that are making MVC usable and allowing me to be confident.
results.content_html: I've really enjoyed the lectures so far. I've struggled for 2 years now trying to get a handle on MVC and the file structure I see in different apps. The theory is easy to discuss but the real world is different. This instructor easily puts it all together, both theory and reality. Finally I'm getting the answers that are making MVC usable and allowing me to be confident.
